entry.title: Developing on Google Cloud with Python and DataFrames (Sponsor: Google)
entry.summary:
Description

Learn how Google Cloud is creating a better Python experience for developers interested in building applications, pipelines, and analytics. This session will cover how developers can use Python with BigQuery, and what's new for developers for DataFrame support in Google Cloud, and ways you can extend these techniques to â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Learn how Google Cloud is creating a better Python experience for developers interested in building applications, pipelines, and analytics. This session will cover how developers can use Python with BigQuery, and what's new for developers for DataFrame support in Google Cloud, and ways you can extend these techniques to make great applications or analyses for business impact.
